translation.en: Tell him.
Yeah, I'm going to tell him.
Now.
Yeah, now.
I've been asking you to do this for months.
Why don't men ever assign tasks to their wives?
translation.zh:
‎为什么没有男人
‎给老婆分派任务呢？

translation.en: I'm not your wife, remember?
Technically, you are.
[scoffs] What's technically?
Well, if you're found dead under mysterious circumstances,
I will be the prime suspect.
Okay. You want me to tell an Indian male that he stinks?
translation.zh:
‎好的 你想告诉我
‎一个印度男人他很臭吗？

translation.en: Keep it down, Shruti.
They understand English.
He just pretends.
[sighs] All right, Arya.
If you don't tell him, I'm going to sack him without a reason.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不告诉他 我就无故解雇他

translation.en: Technically, the car comes under my department.
translation.zh: ‎严格来说 这辆车在我的职责范围内

translation.en: You pay the EMI for the car, I pay for the drivers.
translation.zh:
‎你按月付款买的车
‎可司机的工资是我付的

translation.en: So "technically" he's my department.
translation.zh:
‎所以“严格来说”
‎他在我的职责范围内

translation.en: Just tell him.
You know, a man has different smells in different parts of his body.
translation.zh:
‎你知道的 一个男人
‎身体的不同部位有不同的气味

translation.en: Which smell is exactly bothering you?
[whispering in Punjabi] If his nose worked as well as his dick, we wouldn't be in this situation.
translation.zh:
‎如果他的鼻子和他的屌一样能干
‎我们不会处于这样的境地

translation.en: [in Tamil] When she has no comebacks she blabbers in Punjabi.
translation.zh:
‎她无法回击的时候
‎就会用旁遮普语喋喋不休

translation.en: -[in English] What did you say? -What did you say?
-No, what did you say? -[Arya] Nothing.
I ask you for so little, Arya.
translation.zh: ‎我只要求你这么点事 阿里亚

translation.en: That sounds like marriage.
translation.zh: ‎听起来像是结婚的人说的话

translation.en: That's a great list of books you have right there,
but I noticed you forgot to mention Arya Iyer.
translation.zh: ‎但我注意到你忘记提阿里亚耶尓

translation.en: Arya who?
[woman] Arya Iyer, India's second highest selling novelist.
translation.zh:
‎阿里亚耶尓
‎印度销量排名第二的小说家

translation.en: After you, of course.
Yeah, I think one of his books did sell a few copies.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我想他有一本书确实有点销量

translation.en: But your question to me was books worth reading.
translation.zh: ‎但你是让我列出值得一读的读

translation.en: So…
[woman laughs] Okay, let's talk about your recent book.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 让我们聊聊你最新出版的书

translation.en: Where's your investor?
He's at the bookstore. I think it's this way.
translation.zh: ‎他在书店里 我想应该是这边

translation.en: I don't like him.
You've never even met him.
Yeah, but I know the type.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 但我知道他是什么类型

translation.en: The ones who make elaborate plans to surprise their wives
translation.zh:
‎是那种会准备周密的计划
‎给他们老婆惊喜的人

translation.en: only when others are watching.
[scoffs] You know, there are some sweet men in this world, Arya.
translation.zh: ‎这世界上有一些暖男 阿里亚

translation.en: Get used to it.
Actually, if you'd done those little things,
translation.zh: ‎实际上 如果你曾做过这些小事

translation.en: maybe you'd still have a marriage.
That's not what went wrong with our marriage.
translation.zh: ‎那不是我们婚姻失败的原因

translation.en: So what went wrong with our marriage, Arya?
[chuckles] That's what we're trying to figure out for the past three years.
translation.zh:
‎那正是我们过去三年
‎想要努力弄清楚的问题

translation.en: Maybe nothing went wrong.
Maybe marriage is only for people with no other choice.
translation.zh: ‎或许婚姻只适合没得选的人

translation.en: Nobody else will have them so they're stuck together.
translation.zh:
‎没有别人要他们
‎所以他们只能绑在一块

translation.en: Maybe we're too happening to be stuck in a never-ending marriage.
translation.zh:
‎或许我们也碰巧
‎被绑在了一桩永不结束的婚姻里

translation.en: So we live in the same house
translation.zh: ‎所以我们住在同一栋房子里

translation.en: to fool our daughter into thinking that her parents are together.
translation.zh:
‎骗我们的女儿
‎让她觉得她的爸妈还在一起

translation.en: How are we "happening," Arya?
translation.zh: ‎我们怎么是“碰巧”呢 阿里亚？

translation.en: Well, we have a home. We have a beautiful daughter.
translation.zh: ‎我们有一个家 一个美丽的女儿

translation.en: Over a period of time, we've become good friends.
translation.zh: ‎在那段时间里 我们成为了好朋友

translation.en: And who knows, we might even sleep together.
translation.zh: ‎谁知道呢 我们或许还会睡在一起

translation.en: -Never. -Hey.
Never ever.
A couple never really knows when they've had sex for the very last time.
translation.zh:
‎一对夫妇永远不会知道
‎他们哪一次做爱是最后一次

translation.en: -Look at you. -[Shruti] Ah.
-Such a lovely pair. -[Shruti chuckles]
There's so much love.
You know, I have this instinct for couples who have this magic still on.
translation.zh:
‎我有一种直觉
‎能感受到对彼此还有爱意的夫妇

translation.en: Wow. Your instincts are spot on, man.
-Everybody says that. -They do, huh?
-Arya, this is Mahesh. -Hi, Mahesh.
translation.zh:
‎-阿里亚 这是马赫什
‎-你好 马赫什

translation.en: Thank you so much for doing this.
I'm doing this for her.
I believe you're really important for her business.
translation.zh: ‎我相信你对她的业务真的很重要

translation.en: [Mahesh laughs] Really important.
-Twenty five percent of her revenues. -Yes.
I'm glad I'm doing it then.
Oh, my wife's a big fan of yours.
-She's read all your books. -How about you? Have you read any?
translation.zh:
‎-她读过你写的所有书
‎-你呢？你读过吗？

translation.en: -[Mahesh] Um… -He's kidding.
So what are we doing? I have a flight to catch in an hour.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在是干吗呢？
‎我一个小时后还要赶飞机

translation.en: Yes, yes, so this is the plan.
My wife's book club meeting is happening inside.
translation.zh: ‎我老婆的阅读俱乐部正在里面开会

translation.en: There she is in green.
They're discussing your book and bam, surprise.
translation.zh: ‎他们在讨论你的书 去给她惊喜吧

translation.en: You'll appear and wish her happy birthday.
translation.zh: ‎你出现 然后祝她生日快乐

translation.en: Voilà.
-[Mahesh] Let's do this. -Yeah.
How original.
The way he portrays his female characters, that's what I find amazing.
translation.zh:
‎（古尔冈职业女性阅读俱乐部） ‎我觉得他描绘
‎女性角色的方式非常奇妙

translation.en: And the way he describes the insides of an urban marriage.
He's just so accurate.
[Basu] Geeta, Geeta, hang on.
I thought we were discussing Amartya Sen.
translation.zh:
‎我以为我们刚刚是在讨论
‎阿玛蒂亚森的作品

translation.en: Um, we wanted a break from the serious stuff, Dr. Basu.
translation.zh:
‎我们想暂时
‎把严肃读物放一边 巴苏博士

translation.en: Didn't you get an e-mail?
No, I didn't get any e-mail.
translation.zh: ‎没有 没收到任何电子邮件

translation.en: And in any case, your book club treats its male members
translation.zh:
‎无论如何
‎你们的阅读俱乐部对待男性成员

translation.en: as second class citizens even though they are feminists.
translation.zh:
‎就像是对待二等公民
‎即使他们是女权主义者

translation.en: Um, I'm so sorry about that, Dr. Basu.
Have you read this novel?
No, I don't read such books.
Uh, Dr. Basu, please join us. Now you're already here.
translation.zh:
‎巴苏博士
‎既然你人已经来了 请加入我们

translation.en: -Sit. -Well…
-[Geeta] Hi, Golu. How are you? -Fine, Aunty.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 戈卢 你还好吗？
‎-我很好 阿姨

translation.en: Papa?
-[woman] Arya. -Hi, Geeta.
-[gasps] -Happy birthday.
My God. Oh, my God!
Happy birthday, my darling.
-Happy birthday. Oh. -[Geeta exclaims]
[Geeta] Thank you.
-How do you do these things? -You like it?
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么想到这么做的？
‎-喜欢吗？

translation.en: Like it? I love it. I mean, this is the best surprise ever.
translation.zh:
‎喜欢吗？我超级喜欢
‎这是我收到过的最棒的惊喜

translation.en: [Mahesh] Come here, give me a hug.
So how long have you been married?
-Twelve years. -Yes.
Wow. So what do you do for sex? [chuckles]
Anyway, it was really nice meeting y'all.
translation.zh: ‎不管怎样 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: Uh, and happy birthday again. I have a flight to catch.
translation.zh:
‎再次祝你生日快乐
‎我还有一趟航班要赶

translation.en: What? No, you've just come.
translation.zh: ‎什么？不可以 你才刚刚来呢

translation.en: We have so many questions for you, Arya.
translation.zh: ‎我们有很多问题要问你 阿里亚

translation.en: -We can't let you leave. Please. -I'm in a little bit of a hurry.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不能让你走 拜托了
‎-我有点赶时间

translation.en: No way. You have to stay here
and you have to read from your latest book.
It's my birthday. Come on.
There we go.
"Thousands and thousands of windows,
and behind every window is a shit marriage."
translation.zh: ‎每扇窗户后都是一桩糟糕的婚姻

translation.en: "And amongst these marriages, the worst kind are the ones that are stuck
translation.zh: ‎在所有这些婚姻中 最糟糕的那些

translation.en: right in the middle of the shit scale."
translation.zh: ‎仿佛被卡在一坨屎中的婚姻”

translation.en: "No joy, yet not enough reason to break up."
translation.zh:
‎“没有欢笑
‎但他们还没有充分理由离婚

translation.en: "Therefore, some couples are much luckier than they think."
translation.zh:
‎因此 一些夫妇比他们
‎所想的要幸运得多

translation.en: "At least they have a good enough reason to end their misery."
translation.zh:
‎至少他们有
‎充分理由结束悲惨故事”

translation.en: Is the passage over?
I guess now it is. [chuckles]
Are those my books?
Do you have a Nobel Prize in economics?
translation.zh: ‎你获得了诺贝尔经济学奖吗？

translation.en: Thankfully not. [chuckles]
That won't be good for the business of a pulp fiction writer.
translation.zh: ‎这不利于流行小说作家开展业务呢

translation.en: Well, then I'm afraid these are not your books.
Don't I look familiar to you?
We're neighbors. We moved in only last month.
translation.zh: ‎我们是邻居 我们上个月才搬进来

translation.en: Oh, hi. Sorry.
-Papa, I want to meet him. -Yeah…
Uh, he's my son, Gollu. Big fan.
translation.zh: ‎他是我儿子 戈卢 你的超级粉丝

translation.en: -Hi, Gollu. -[in Hindi] Go.
[in English] He's a fan.
Hi.
Uh, can you step out for a second, please?
What?
I don't shake the hand of teenage boys.
But why?
It's a policy.
Look, pardon me for saying this. I'm a political economist.
translation.zh:
‎请原谅我这么说
‎我是一名政治经济学家

translation.en: I write policies every day. Never heard of such a policy.
translation.zh:
‎我每天都要写政策
‎但我从没听说过这样一条原则

translation.en: Let's just say it's a phobia.
Why can't you shake the hand of a boy?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不能和一个男孩握手呢？

translation.en: At this stage in their lives,
uh, their hands are busy doing stuff, you know.
translation.zh: ‎他们的手可忙了 你懂的

translation.en: Which I don't have a problem with. That's fine. But, uh…
translation.zh: ‎我不介意 没关系 但是…

translation.en: they don't wash after.
But he's just 14.
[in Hindi] Let's go, Ganesh.
[in English] Hey, do you even know where I'm going?
Fuck. It's come to this.
translation.zh: ‎该死的 已经到了这个地步

translation.en: -Where are you going? -Mumbai.
What for?
-Now you're just faffing. -No, I really want to know.
translation.zh:
‎-现在你小题大作了
‎-不 我是真的想知道

translation.en: Netflix wants to meet.
-They want the film rights of my latest. -Oh, wow. That's a big meeting.
translation.zh:
‎-他们想要我新书的电影版权
‎-那真是重要的会

translation.en: -[Arya] Yeah. -Don't let them jip you, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-别让他们把你耍了 好吗？

translation.en: You want me to negotiate?
I'll manage. Thank you.
-I'll see you in a couple of days. -Yeah.
Hey, listen, listen.
I'm changing my Facebook status.
The relationship status.
I'm making it single.
Shruti, we had decided to keep it quiet till we know how Rohini is going to react.
translation.zh:
‎丝路提 我们已经决定了 在知道
‎罗希尼会作何反应之前选择隐瞒

translation.en: But it is all quiet. I mean, nobody's really going to notice.
translation.zh: ‎但这已经很低调了 没人会注意的

translation.en: Why are you doing it?
'Cause it's a first step, and I need a first step.
translation.zh: ‎因为这是第一步 我需要迈出第一步

translation.en: When do you plan to do it?
Let's see.
[in Hindi] Let's go, Ganesh.
-[in Hindi] Hello. -[guard] Hello.
-[Arya in Hindi] What are you doing? -Checking your ticket.
-But why? -This is my duty.
translation.zh:
‎-但是为什么呢？
‎-这是我的职责

translation.en: How do you know this is not a fake ticket?
-Is it fake? -No, I'm saying…
Your seniors are just wasting your time.
translation.zh: ‎你的领导只是在浪费你的时间

translation.en: -They made you wear this dress-- -Mister.
translation.zh:
‎-他们让你们穿上这身礼服…
‎-先生

translation.en: Does this look like a dress?
This is a uniform. We get it to serve the country.
translation.zh:
‎这是一套制服
‎我们穿上它为国家服务

translation.en: No, you are serving the country,
but people in your village are thinking
you're in this uniform fighting dangerous terrorists in Kashmir.
translation.zh:
‎你穿这身制服
‎在克什米尔和危险的恐怖分子战斗

translation.en: But you're standing here and checking tickets.
[man in English] Why are you insulting a soldier?
This guy's insulting a soldier.
No, I'm not insulting a soldier.
[in Hindi] Get out of the line.
-What did I do? -[guard] Get out of the line.
Get out.
[in English] Gate number four. Gate number four.
Gate number four.
-[cell phone chimes] -[Arya] Notes from the field.
There's a man here who's looking at mobile screens trying to check tickets.
translation.zh:
‎这里有个男人
‎一边看手机 一边检票

translation.en: He has no machine here that can validate the authenticity of those tickets.
translation.zh:
‎他没有机器可以验证
‎这些票的真实性

translation.en: But he's here doing a boring job.
Hey! Hello.
Who are you calling boring? He's a soldier.
translation.zh: ‎你说谁无聊呢？他是一名士兵

translation.en: He's not from the army, you ignorant moron!
translation.zh:
‎他不是陆军派来的
‎你个无知的蠢货！

translation.en: Hello, you, mister…
You better mind your language. I know what moron means.
translation.zh:
‎你最好注意你的言辞
‎我知道蠢货是什么意思

translation.en: And yet he doesn't have a problem with the word ignorant.
[man in Hindi] If he's not from the army, is he from the navy?
translation.zh:
‎如果他不是来自陆军
‎他是否来自海军？

translation.en: Okay, tell me the full form of the CISF.
translation.zh: ‎好的 告诉我中安队的全称

translation.en: [in English] Don't act smart, you anti-national.
translation.zh: ‎别耍聪明 你个反国家主义者

translation.en: Okay. What language is our national anthem in?
-Sanskrit. -[Arya] No.
-[man] Hindi. -No.
Okay, Malayali.
And this moron thinks Malayali is a language.
translation.zh: ‎这个蠢货以为马拉亚利是一种语言

translation.en: [in Hindi] You will not get entry from any gate.
[in English] Ma'am, please come here.
Ma'am, please come.
Ma'am.
[Arya] Oh, there you are.
-I'm very sorry, sir. -It's all right.
We're trying to figure out what has happened.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在弄清楚发生了什么

translation.en: Did you create some trouble?
I didn't create any trouble. I didn't say anything to anybody.
translation.zh:
‎我没有制造任何麻烦
‎我没有跟任何人说任何话

translation.en: In fact, my flight is in the next 40 minutes.
translation.zh:
‎实际上 再过40分钟
‎我的航班就要起飞了

translation.en: Security has a major concern.
You can't fly to Mumbai today, sir. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎先生 你今天不能飞去孟买 抱歉

translation.en: We're putting you on the No Fly List.
No Fly?
Ah, you haven't left?
My-my-my-my flight got canceled.
[Shruti over phone] Oh. So now?
So you free for dinner?
Okay.
[woman in Vietnamese] Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
[in English] Oh, hi. Are you from Mizoram?
-Meghalaya, sir. -Ah.
They put you up in this fancy dress costume
and pass you off as somebody from Vietnam.
-Are you okay with this? -Hmm.
-Yes, sir. -Does it not bother you at all?
translation.zh:
‎-是的 先生
‎-你一点也不感到烦恼吗？

translation.en: -No, sir. -Just a wee bit?
translation.zh:
‎-不会的 先生
‎-一点也没有？

translation.en: Yes, a bit.
[man] Welcome, sir.
[in Vietnamese] Hello.
[in English] Sin, definitely it is.
Where's my wife?
Sir, she's there.
Oh, my God. Arya. I'm a big fan. Like, a big, big fan.
translation.zh:
‎我的天啦 阿里亚
‎我是你的超级粉丝 超级喜欢你

translation.en: Oh. So do you work here?
Oh. No. I'm a professional photographer with Lifecatchers.
translation.zh:
‎不是的
‎我是“捕捉人生”的专业摄影师

translation.en: What's Lifecatchers?
[woman] Oh. You don't know Lifecatchers?
-Isn't that what I just said? -[woman] Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-刚刚我不就这么问的吗？
‎-抱歉

translation.en: So we capture the most important moments of our clients' lives.
translation.zh: ‎我们捕捉客户生活里最重要的时刻

translation.en: -Wow. -What the fuck are you doing?
Am I paying you to chat?
Focus.
-That's our client. -A very pissed one apparently.
translation.zh:
‎-那是我们的客户
‎-他显然很恼火

translation.en: Yeah, he's pretty nervous.
He's gonna propose to that woman.
He wants us to capture the moment when she finds the ring.
translation.zh:
‎他想要我们捕捉到
‎她找到戒指的那个瞬间

translation.en: Hopefully she screams and cries.
And where's the ring?
[whispers] It's going to be in the dessert.
Oh. How original.
So you need to act accordingly. You can't be in your comfort zone.
translation.zh:
‎所以你需要采取相应的行动
‎你不能呆在自己的舒适区里

translation.en: You will have to go out.
[man] That's absolutely right.
You'll have to expand your horizon.
It's like we're in a world where beauty is often with the beast.
translation.zh:
‎就好像我们身处于一个
‎美女通常被野兽占有的世界

translation.en: Hi.
Hey, thanks for the cushion.
[Shruti] Your back needs it more than mine.
[Arya] That's very considerate.
Hey, Shruti. Do you see the couple behind me?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 丝路提
‎你看到我身后的那对了吗？

translation.en: That man is going to propose to the lady tonight.
translation.zh: ‎那个男人今晚要向那名女士求婚

translation.en: -She totally knows he's going to propose. -[Arya] How do you know that?
translation.zh:
‎-她完全知道他要求婚
‎-你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Look at her.
Every fucking thing about her says he's going to get sex
translation.zh:
‎她身上的每一点都显露出了
‎他接下来的每一晚

translation.en: every single night.
Food and sex and food and sex.
And that's going to be the story of their lives.
Hello. You're making it very obvious.
Yeah, well, what do I care?
I don't like guys like him in the first place,
translation.zh: ‎首先我不喜欢像他那样的人

translation.en: who make this grand gesture of proposing.
You know, it's never about the girl. It's all about themselves.
translation.zh:
‎这从来跟女方没关系
‎这完全是为了他们自己

translation.en: "Oh, look. Such a nice guy I am."
translation.zh: ‎“看吧 我是多好的一个人啊”

translation.en: "I'm spending so much money on this moment and this is how much I loved her."
translation.zh:
‎“我为这一刻花了这么多钱
‎我是如此深爱她”

translation.en: Bullshit.
You know, when I was his age,
translation.zh: ‎你知道的 我在他这个年纪的时候

translation.en: most of the girls I was interested in didn't even know that.
translation.zh:
‎大多数我喜欢的女孩
‎甚至都不知道我喜欢她们

translation.en: I know.
No, seriously. My generation was never about the show.
translation.zh: ‎不 认真的 我那一代人从来不做作

translation.en: We spent hours and hours trying to get the girl, get this, happy.
translation.zh:
‎我们花很多时间想要让女孩…
‎听好了 想让她们开心

translation.en: No, seriously. Look…
No, seriously. Look…
Son of a bitch.
Hey, um…
Can you order? I'll just be back.
-Uh, what do you… What? -[Arya] The usual.
[in Hindi] Why are you standing? Sit down.
[man in English] This is the bathroom.
Okay, okay.
Hi.
Hi.
[in Hindi] Sir, one moment.
-[in English] Hey. -Hi.
You too write well.
But you use difficult words like "furtive" and…
translation.zh:
‎但你用了让人难以理解的词
‎比如“鬼鬼祟祟” 还有…

translation.en: -Inadequate? -Uh…
-All the best. -My apologies.
[Arya] So how have you been?
I've been good. What's up with you?
translation.zh: ‎我挺好的 你的近况如何？

translation.en: All good. Uh, Netflix may be buying my books. Maybe all of them.
translation.zh:
‎我很好 NETFLIX或许
‎会买我的书 或许全部买下

translation.en: -Nice. -How about you?
They can't afford me.
Hey, so I have an outrageous request.
I'm here with my wife for dinner,
and I was wondering if you could come over to my table
translation.zh: ‎我在想你是否能来我们的桌上

translation.en: and say something.
Something fan-like, so I can get some brownie points with my wife.
translation.zh:
‎就像粉丝会说的话
‎这样我可以在我老婆面前长点脸

translation.en: That's sweet. Yeah, I'll do it.
Oh, you'll do it?
Yeah, such a small thing.
You run along, I'll join you guys.
That's very kind of you. Thank you.
-So I'll see you around. -Yeah, see you around.
-[man] Chetan? -[in Hindi] Yes?
-[in English] Oh. Selfie? Huh. -Check this.
[man over video] This guy is insulting a soldier.
[Arya in Hindi] They made you wear this dress--
translation.zh:
‎-他们让你们穿上这身礼服…
‎-先生！

translation.en: [guard] Mister! You think this is a dress?
This is a uniform. We get it to serve the country.
translation.zh:
‎这是一套制服
‎我们穿上它为国家服务

translation.en: No, you are serving the country.
In India, we should have compulsory military training.
translation.zh:
‎在印度 我们应该有
‎强制的军事训练

translation.en: -[in English] Just like the Israelis. -Exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-就像以色列人那样
‎-完全正确

translation.en: [in Hindi] I say the same thing to my friends, but they laugh at me.
translation.zh: ‎我跟我朋友也这么说 但他们嘲笑我

translation.en: [man] He is absolutely correct.
[in English] The middle class in this country these days
translation.zh: ‎如今这个国家里的中产阶级

translation.en: is so anti-intellectual.
Semi-literates.
Semi-literates.
Hey, so what did I miss?
[Shruti] She just cried.
Oh, shit. That mean they're gonna cancel the dessert?
translation.zh:
‎该死的 那意味着
‎他们要取消甜点了？

translation.en: No. It's a happy cry.
"Vicky, life is just so perfect in this moment."
translation.zh: ‎“维姬 此刻的人生是如此完美”

translation.en: "Vicky, I could die in your arms."
translation.zh: ‎“维姬 我愿在你怀里死去”

translation.en: "I could die in your arms tonight."
Kind of a thing.
Two coconut chocolate ice creams, please.
translation.zh: ‎两份椰子巧克力冰淇淋 谢谢

translation.en: And the moment has arrived.
[Arya] Just check out the size of this table.
Where the hell is he going to keep the food?
-On top of that, this huge flower-- -Let them be. They're pretty.
translation.zh:
‎-而且还有这个巨大的花…
‎-别动它们 它们很漂亮

translation.en: You know why women like flowers?
translation.zh: ‎你知道女人为什么喜欢花吗？

translation.en: [Shruti] Why?
Because flowers are vaginas.
Then you should like them, no?
translation.zh: ‎那你也应该喜欢它们 不是吗？

translation.en: -[hesitates] See the bees-- -[Chetan] Arya?
Oh, man, I read your book. It was so good.
translation.zh: ‎天啦 我读过你的书 你写得真好

translation.en: So good to see you here, man.
One selfie, you and me?
What are you doing, Chetan?
Where are your manners?
Where's your decency, man?
I'm having a private moment with my wife.
translation.zh: ‎我正在和我老婆享受二人世界

translation.en: Can we do this later, please?
Run along. Go on.
Some people just don't get it.
What the fuck was that, Arya?
-[Arya] Why? -What just happened?
What got into you?
[Arya] I wanna have a private time with you.
This is important for me.
-Oh. Since when? -[cell phone chiming]
Come on. It's always meant a great deal to me.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 这一直都对我很重要

translation.en: What's wrong with you, Shruti? I'm so offended.
translation.zh:
‎你怎么回事 丝路提？
‎我被你冒犯到了

translation.en: [woman] Oh, shit!
Hey…
What are you guys doing? What are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎你们在做什么？你们在干什么？

translation.en: Hey, boss, we came here for a quiet dinner.
translation.zh:
‎老板 我们来这是为了
‎享受一顿安静的晚餐

translation.en: -Not to see some guy do his peacock dance. -Arya--
translation.zh:
‎-不是来看一个男人跳孔雀舞
‎-阿里亚…

translation.en: No, seriously. And you know what?
translation.zh: ‎不 认真的 你知道吗？

translation.en: The worst part is, this is not even about you.
translation.zh: ‎最糟糕的是这甚至与你无关

translation.en: It's about how cute he is.
It's phoney guys like him who have ruined the lives of honest men
translation.zh:
‎就是像他这样虚伪的男人
‎毁了诚实男人的一生

translation.en: who don't want to do shit like this.
translation.zh: ‎因为后者不愿意干这恶心的事

translation.en: You are one asshole fellow!
[in Hindi] He ruined the proposal.
My little brother was working on this for a whole week.
[in English] You brought your entire family to watch this drama?
-He brought his-- -Arya, please.
He is my brother and nephew.
Oh, how considerate. I know people like you.
translation.zh: ‎多么贴心啊 ‎我了解你这种人

translation.en: You're the kind of guy who will take his parents to the honeymoon.
translation.zh: ‎你是那种会带着父母去度蜜月的人

translation.en: -You sure you want to marry this buffoon? -[man] Sir…
translation.zh:
‎-你确定你想跟这个小丑结婚？
‎-先生…

translation.en: -Yes. -You're disturbing everyone.
I'm disturbing everyone?
Have you seen these grown men in costumes?
translation.zh:
‎你看到了穿这种服饰的
‎这些成年男人吗？

translation.en: [man] Sir, this is their job. This is what they do.
translation.zh:
‎先生 这是他们的工作
‎他们就是干这行的

translation.en: [Arya] I'm not talking about their jobs.
But why'd you have to make them look like fools?
translation.zh: ‎但你们为什么 非得让他们出丑？

translation.en: Whom are you calling fools? We are just playing our set.
translation.zh:
‎你在说谁出丑呢？
‎我们只是在表演我们的节目

translation.en: Not you, brother. I'm saying he's making you look like--
translation.zh:
‎不是说你 哥们
‎我是说他让你们看起来像是…

translation.en: -Sir, we'll take full payment for this. -[Arya] You should--
translation.zh:
‎-先生 我们会要求付全款的
‎-你应该…

translation.en: [screams] Harry!
[in Hindi] He spoiled my moment.
He is a traitor!
-[man 1] Fucker! -[man 2] Hold his hand.
Hey, hold on.
Come on, Professor. These types of people behave better after two slaps.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 教授 这种人
‎吃两记耳光后会听话得多

translation.en: [Basu] No, Mr. Singh.
We are from Gandhi's country.
Violence is wrong.
[in English] Wait, wait, wait. Uh…
Let the youngest amongst you reach out to this man for peace.
translation.zh:
‎让你们中最年轻的人
‎出来和这个人和解

translation.en: -[in Punjabi] What's your name, dear? -Satvinder.
translation.zh:
‎-你叫什么名字 孩子？
‎-萨特翁德

translation.en: Yes, Satvinder.
[In Hindi] Give your hand to Uncle.
Shake his hand, dear.
Shake it.
[in English] What are you waiting for? Shake his hand.
At this stage in their lives, they're hands are busy doing stuff.
translation.zh:
‎在他们人生中的这个阶段
‎他们的手可忙了

translation.en: [in English] Arya, shake his hand.
Come on, man. Shake his hand.
They don't wash after.
[man 3 in Hindi] What are you looking at? Shake his hand.
[in English] Come on, man. Shake his hand.
